enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Erhard Jauck, State Secretary, called upon the other Annex I Parties to commit themselves to stabilizing CO2<D> emissions, and cited Germany's goal of halving emission of GHGs, expressed in CO2 equivalents, by 2005.
He listed the elements necessary for a protocol and stressed the need for creating incentives for co-operation.
